title: Deaths at AIDS Healthcare Foundation Residential Properties

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Deaths at AIDS Healthcare Foundation Residential Properties
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

From September 1, 20117, to the present, please provide all death certificates for individuals who were found deceased at the following addresses owned by the AIDS Healthcare Foundation:
1. The Madison Hotel, 423 E. 7th Street, Los Angeles 90014
2. The Baltimore Hotel, 501 S. Los Angeles St., Los Angeles 90013
3. The King Edward Hotel, 121 E. 5th Street, Los Angeles, CA 90013
4. The Whitley Hotel, 1732 Whitley Ave., Los Angeles, CA 90028
5. Sunrise on Sunset, 6516 W. Sunset Blvd., Los Angeles, CA 90028
6. Cypress Arms, 2612 Idell St., Los Angeles, CA 90065
7. Valley Haven, 13313 Oxnard St., Valley Glen, CA 91401
8. Pride Hotel, 1239 S. Atlantic Blvd., Los Angeles, CA 90022
9. The Sinclair, 2200 W. 8th Street, Los Angeles, CA 90057
10. The Barclay Hotel, 103 W. 4th St., Los Angeles, CA 90013
11. Casa De Corazon, 5379 Whittier Blvd., (East), Los Angeles, CA 90022
12. Olympic Hotel, 725 Westlake Blvd., Los Angeles, CA 90057

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Annette Morasch
